main.name: Derrick Alberto Darku
main.description: Versatile Software Developer with more than 4 years of experience with production-level projects and interacting with international clients
main.bio: My name is Derrick Alberto Darku, I'm a WEB Developer. Currently, I'm honing my skills at CODETRAIN while also mentoring my colleagues. A self-directed leader with talent at cultivating a collaborative and supportive team environment. I enjoy being challenged and engaged with projects that require me to work beyond my comfort and knowledge set, as I get to explore and learn new languages with different development techniques which are important for growth of any professional like me as well as the success of any organisation.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details, get coached or anything else.

testimonials.text: Derrick has been a very hard working and dependable consultant. He understands the business requirements and goes extra mile to deliver it. Highly professional and great value add to any team.
testimonials.user: Max Dwamena,  Ex-Principal Consultant at derrandz company

testimonials.text: I had worked with Derrick in Tunda Vala for more than 1 year, I was senior to him. I had the pleasure of working with him. His dedication toward his work was outstanding and he always had positive attitude toward new learning. He is dedicated, self-motivated, trustworthy, independent and very capable. Derrick would be an asset to any Company.
testimonials.user: Kofi  Jamal, Technology Lead at Tunda Vala
